00019 void MultipleReferencedData::ReleaseData(MultipleReferencedData* multiple_referenced_data)
00020 {
00021   multiple_referenced_data->RemoveRef();
00022   if(!( multiple_referenced_data->IsStillUseful()))
00023     {
00024       MethodForRelease method_for_release = multiple_referenced_data->methodForRelease;
00025       if(method_for_release == NULL)
00026     {
00027       delete multiple_referenced_data;
00028     }
00029       else
00030     {
00031       method_for_release(multiple_referenced_data);
00032     }
00033     }
00034 }

00036 void MultipleReferencedData::AddRef()
00037 {
00038     NbCurrentRef++;
00039 }
00040
00041 void MultipleReferencedData::RemoveRef()
00042 {
00043     NbCurrentRef--;
00044 }
00045
00046 bool MultipleReferencedData::IsStillUseful() const
00047 {
00048     return NbCurrentRef > 0;
00049 }
